title: Gianni Infantino - Wikipedia
snippet: Infantino was born on 23 March 1970 in Brig, Switzerland. He is a son of Italian immigrant parents from the Italian regions of Calabria and Lombardy and has the citizenship of both countries. He studied law at the University of Fribourg.

title: Gianni Infantino: FIFA's First Italian President | Al Majalla

title: Gianni Infantino
snippet: Gianni Infantino (born 23 March 1970) is a Swiss-Italian football administrator serving as the ninth president of FIFA since his election on 26 February 2016. Born in Brig, Switzerland, to Italian immigrant parents from Calabria and Lombardy, ...

title: Gianni Infantino - IMDb
snippet: Gianni Infantino. Self: Sportpanorama. Gianni Infantino was born on 23 March 1970 in Brig, Valais, Switzerland. He has been married to Leena Al Ashqar since 2001. They have four children.

title: Gianni Infantino: How a Swiss man of Italian origin reached the top of FIFA.
snippet: Giovanni Vincenzo Infantino, known as Gianni, was born on March 23, 1970, in the city of Brig, Switzerland.
